title: Form
context: §806-10 Form. The indictment may be substantially in the following form: In the Circuit Court of the &hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip; Judicial Circuit, State of Hawaii &hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;, Term 20&hellip;.. The State of Hawaii vs. &hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;., defendant. The Grand Jury of the &hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip; Circuit of the State of Hawaii do present that (here give name or description of the accused). (Here set forth the offense and transaction according to the rules in this chapter enunciated.) A True Bill found this &hellip;&hellip;&hellip;. day of &hellip;&hellip;&hellip;.., 20&hellip;.. Signed: &hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip; Foreperson of the Grand Jury. Signed: &hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip;&hellip; (Official title of prosecuting officer.) [L 1915, c 215, pt of §2; RL 1925, §4049; RL 1935, §5508; RL 1945, §10810; RL 1955, §258-20; HRS §711-10; ren L 1972, c 9, pt of §1; gen ch 1993] Revision Note The date &ldquo;19&hellip;..&rdquo; in the form was changed to &ldquo;20&hellip;..&rdquo; pursuant to §23G-16. Rules of Court Nature and contents of indictment, see HRPP rule 7(d). Case Notes Cited: 37 H. 625, 643 (1947), questioned 82 F. Supp. 65, 104 (1948).
